I dont normally bother with reviews. But for Portal 2 the game impacted me in such a way I wanted to put some words to just how good this game is. 

I finished Portal 1 way back when it came out years ago and had been looking forward to the release of this game. For whatever reason I never got round to playing Portal 2 - but man, I'm so so glad that I revisited this many years later and played it on P.C. What. A. Game. 

Portal 2 is funny, charming, witty and challenging and is every bit an improvement of the original game. It doesn't reinvent the wheel like the first game but my god does it elevate the series to new heights and cement its legacy as a true classic. 

For such an old game the art style holds up so well and it has all of the charm and then some from the first. Steven Merchant is the stand out performer as expected and the though the gameplay doesn't innovate in the way the first game did way back when, it is a refinement and honing of such a craft that allows for many a challenge and some of the later test chambers really show and display just how creative and smart Valve have honed the sandbox to this game.

This is a must play for any fans of the original game, or fans of Puzzle Games. Valve don't make many games these days which is a shame, but this game holds up so well and is a credit to Valve as a developer that their games feel fresh many years later. 

Now...about that third game. Portal 2: Episode 1...please Valve?
Игра очень крутая с захватывающим и интересным сюжетом! Советую пройти всем 😁

Это сближает и открывает человека, с которым вы проходите Портал 2, с новой стороны. Также можно поиздеваться над товарищем, это бывает весьма забавным;)
